alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pike and Amite Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Smithdale, or 7 miles west of Mccomb, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Liberty, Summit, Smithdale, Gillsburg and Mccomb Airport. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 12 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
